alert.note: Alert for Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 8:28PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pinellas County through 900 PM EDT... At 827 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Downtown Saint Petersburg, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Desoto Park, Saint Petersburg, Downtown Saint Petersburg, St. Petersburg, St. Pete Beach, Tierra Verde, Gulfport, South Pasadena, Albert Whitted Airport, Tropicana Field, Pass-A-Grille Beach, Lake Maggiore, Boyd Hill Nature Preserve and Pinellas Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
